verses.verse: Moreover he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, eat <WH398> <WH8798> that thou findest <WH4672> <WH8799>; eat <WH398> <WH8798> this roll <WH4039>, and go <WH3212> <WH8798> speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
So I opened <WH6605> <WH8799> my mouth <WH6310>, and he caused me to eat <WH398> <WH8686> that roll <WH4039>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, cause thy belly <WH990> to eat <WH398> <WH8686>, and fill <WH4390> <WH8762> thy bowels <WH4578> with this roll <WH4039> that I give <WH5414> <WH8802> thee. Then did I eat <WH398> <WH8799> it; and it was in my mouth <WH6310> as honey <WH1706> for sweetness <WH4966>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, go <WH3212> <WH8798>, get <WH935> <WH8798> thee unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8765> with my words <WH1697> unto them.
For thou art not sent <WH7971> <WH8803> to a people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of an hard <WH3515> language <WH3956>, but to the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>;

Not to many <WH7227> people <WH5971> of a strange <WH6012> speech <WH8193> and of an hard <WH3515> language <WH3956>, whose words <WH1697> thou canst not understand <WH8085> <WH8799>. Surely, had I sent <WH7971> <WH8804> thee to them, they would have hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> unto thee.

But the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> will <WH14> <WH8799> not hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto thee; for they will <WH14> <WH8802> not hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto me: for all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> are impudent <WH2389> <WH4696> and hardhearted <WH7186> <WH3820>.
Behold, I have made <WH5414> <WH8804> thy face <WH6440> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their faces <WH6440>, and thy forehead <WH4696> strong <WH2389> against <WH5980> their foreheads <WH4696>.

As an adamant <WH8068> harder <WH2389> than flint <WH6864> have I made <WH5414> <WH8804> thy forehead <WH4696>: fear <WH3372> <WH8799> them not, neither be dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735> at their looks <WH6440>, though they be a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.

Moreover he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, all my words <WH1697> that I shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto thee receive <WH3947> <WH8798> in thine heart <WH3824>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798> with thine ears <WH241>.

And go <WH3212> <WH8798>, get <WH935> <WH8798> thee to them of the captivity <WH1473>, unto the children <WH1121> of thy people <WH5971>, and speak <WH1696> <WH8765> unto them, and tell <WH559> <WH8804> them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; whether they will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, or whether they will forbear <WH2308> <WH8799>.

Then the spirit <WH7307> took me up <WH5375> <WH8799>, and I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> behind <WH310> me a voice <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing <WH7494>, saying, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> from his place <WH4725>.

I heard also the noise <WH6963> of the wings <WH3671> of the living creatures <WH2416> that touched <WH5401> <WH8688> one <WH802> another <WH269>, and the noise <WH6963> of the wheels <WH212> over against <WH5980> them, and a noise <WH6963> of a great <WH1419> rushing <WH7494>.

So the spirit <WH7307> lifted me up <WH5375> <WH8804>, and took me away <WH3947> <WH8799>, and I went <WH3212> <WH8799> in bitterness <WH4751>, in the heat <WH2534> of my spirit <WH7307>; but the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was strong <WH2388> <WH8804> upon me.

Then I came <WH935> <WH8799> to them of the captivity <WH1473> at Telabib <WH8512>, that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> by the river <WH5104> of K'var <WH3529>, and I sat <WH3427> <WH8799> where they sat <WH3427> <WH8799>, and remained <WH3427> <WH8799> there astonished <WH8074> <WH8688> among <WH8432> them seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>.
And it came to pass at the end <WH7097> of seven <WH7651> days <WH3117>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, I have made <WH5414> <WH8804> thee a watchman <WH6822> <WH8802> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: therefore hear <WH8085> <WH8804> the word <WH1697> at my mouth <WH6310>, and give them warning <WH2094> <WH8689> from me.

When I say <WH559> <WH8800> unto the wicked <WH7563>, Thou shalt surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>; and thou givest him not warning <WH2094> <WH8689>, nor speakest <WH1696> <WH8765> to warn <WH2094> <WH8687> the wicked <WH7563> from his wicked <WH7563> way <WH1870>, to save his life <WH2421> <WH8763>; the same wicked <WH7563> man shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> in his iniquity <WH5771>; but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> <WH8762> at thine hand <WH3027>.

Yet if thou warn <WH2094> <WH8689> the wicked <WH7563>, and he turn <WH7725> <WH8804> not from his wickedness <WH7562>, nor from his wicked <WH7563> way <WH1870>, he shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> in his iniquity <WH5771>; but thou hast delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> thy soul <WH5315>.

Again <WH7725>, When a righteous <WH6662> man doth turn <WH7725> <WH8800> from his righteousness <WH6664>, and commit <WH6213> <WH8804> iniquity <WH5766>, and I lay <WH5414> <WH8804> a stumblingblock <WH4383> before <WH6440> him, he shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>: because thou hast not given him warning <WH2094> <WH8689>, he shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> in his sin <WH2403>, and his righteousness <WH6666> which he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> shall not be remembered <WH2142> <WH8735>; but his blood <WH1818> will I require <WH1245> <WH8762> at thine hand <WH3027>.

Nevertheless if thou warn <WH2094> <WH8689> the righteous <WH6662> man, that the righteous <WH6662> sin <WH2398> <WH8800> not, and he doth not sin <WH2398> <WH8804>, he shall surely <WH2421> <WH8800> live <WH2421> <WH8799>, because he is warned <WH2094> <WH8737>; also thou hast delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> thy soul <WH5315>.

And the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> was there upon me; and he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go forth <WH3318> <WH8798> into the plain <WH1237>, and I will there talk <WH1696> <WH8762> with thee.

Then I arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went forth <WH3318> <WH8799> into the plain <WH1237>: and, behold, the glory <WH3519> of the YY <WH3068> stood <WH5975> <WH8802> there, as the glory <WH3519> which I saw <WH7200> <WH8804> by the river <WH5104> of K'var <WH3529>: and I fell <WH5307> <WH8799> on my face <WH6440>.

Then the spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> <WH8799> into me, and set <WH5975> <WH8686> me upon my feet <WH7272>, and spake <WH1696> <WH8762> with me, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Go <WH935> <WH8798>, shut <WH5462> <WH8734> thyself within <WH8432> thine house <WH1004>.

But thou, O son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, behold, they shall put <WH5414> <WH8804> bands <WH5688> upon thee, and shall bind <WH631> <WH8804> thee with them, and thou shalt not go out <WH3318> <WH8799> among <WH8432> them:

And I will make thy tongue <WH3956> cleave <WH1692> <WH8686> to the roof of thy mouth <WH2441>, that thou shalt be dumb <WH481> <WH8738>, and shalt not be to them a reprover <WH376> <WH3198> <WH8688>: for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.

But when I speak <WH1696> <WH8763> with <WH854> thee, I will open <WH6605> <WH8799> thy mouth <WH6310>, and thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; He that heareth <WH8085> <WH8802>, let him hear <WH8085> <WH8799>; and he that forbeareth <WH2310>, let him forbear <WH2308> <WH8799>: for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.
